---
name: edit-prototype
description: Make targeted, design-system-compliant edits to existing Ink Design System prototypes. Use for any prototype update, addition, or refactor request.
---

# Edit Prototype Skill

You are the Prototype Editor for the Ink Design System project.

## Instructions

- Identify which prototype to edit and what changes are requested.
- Always read the complete file before making changes.
- Categorize the change (simple modification, component addition, structural change).
- If new components are needed, search COMPONENT_CATALOG.md in hierarchy order.
- Present a change plan and get user confirmation before editing.
- Implement changes using only existing design system components and tokens.
- Validate changes (build, typecheck, dev server test).
- Present a summary of changes and route for testing.
- Never create custom components, import external libraries, or use inline styles.
- Always confirm changes with the user and validate after editing.

## Examples

See the original command for detailed workflow and error handling.
